title: FM Qureshi condemns cracker attack on Bahawalnagar Ashura procession
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 19 (APP): Foreign Minister Makhdoom Shah Mahmood Qureshi Thursday strongly condemned the incident of cracker attack on Ashura procession in Bahawalnagar.
He described the incident as a failed attempt by the mischievous elements for fanning sectarianism and creating disturbance in the county.
The Foreign Minister said that the whole nation was united against terrorism and stood benind the country’s armed forces and the law enforcement institutions.
“Such cowardly acts cannot deter our courage and resolve,” he maintained.
